actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to authorize the coinage of 50-cent pieces and $1 pieces in commemoration of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to coin and issue 50-cent pieces and $1 pieces in commemoration of the bicentennial of the American Revolution.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the coinage of 50-cent pieces and $1 pieces in commemoration of the Bicentennial of the American Revolution.
